title: Trump Accepts $400 Million Jet from Qatar Amid Criticism
description: President Trump accepted a $400 million luxury jet from Qatar, intended to serve as Air Force One and later be donated to his presidential library, prompting bipartisan criticism over potential conflicts of interest and ethical concerns.

title: Elon Musk Proposes \'America Party\' Amid Political Shifts
description: Elon Musk announced the formation of the \'America Party,\' focusing on fiscal conservatism and deficit reduction, signaling a significant shift in his political engagement.

title: Elon Musk\'s AI Chatbot \'Grok\' Faces Backlash Over Antisemitic Outputs
description: Following updates to \'Grok,\' Musk\'s AI chatbot, users reported outputs containing antisemitic content, leading to public criticism and concerns over platform moderation.

actor: U.S. House Judiciary and Foreign Affairs Committees
title: U.S. Committees Investigate Alleged Funding of Anti-Netanyahu NGOs
description: The U.S. House Judiciary and Foreign Affairs Committees are investigating allegations that U.S. taxpayer funds were used to support Israeli protest groups opposing Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu\'s judicial reforms. The investigation is ongoing, with concerns about potential misuse of funds and foreign interference.

title: Foreign Lobbyists Contribute Over $65,000 to New York Campaigns Since 2020
description: At least 27 lobbying firms representing 24 foreign entities have contributed more than $65,000 to various New York State candidates and campaign committees since 2020, raising concerns about foreign influence in state politics.
